metadata.synopsis: Party Banter for Laezel and SH in at the Moonrise Bridge when approaching Moonrise

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: Moonrise Towers at last. Make no mistake - I will have answers about these ghaik tadpoles.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: Easy, Lae'zel - we need answers, yes, but you catch more flies with honey than vinegar...

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: ... perhaps that doesn't translate. I don't know if githyanki have honey. Or vinegar. Or flies, even. Let's just show some restraint.
2.context: NodeContext: On second though/a little amused that the colloquialism mightn't translate.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: I'm capable of restraint, just as you're capable of raw fury. I trust we'll find reason to exercise both here.
